technique_name: 侧踢拖脚直立 Cé Ti Bảo Jiáo Zhi Li (Side kick up to catch the foot at head level with the leg held vertically while remaining standing)
deduction_content: 支撑腿弯曲 - Supporting Leg Bent
上等腿弯曲 - Raised Leg Bent

questions.question: What is the error code for Cé Ti Bảo Jiáo Zhi Li (Side kick up to catch the foot at head level)?
What are the two main deduction points for Cé Ti Bảo Jiáo Zhi Li?
questions.answer: Deductions are applied when: 1) Supporting leg is bent, and 2) Raised leg is bent.

questions.question: How should both legs be positioned in a correct Cé Ti Bảo Jiáo Zhi Li balance technique?
questions.answer: Both the supporting leg and the raised leg should be completely straight, with no bending at the knees.
